abstract: Argentina's national soccer team is under pressure heading into Copa America, which could be final chance for generation of its talented players including Lionel Messi to win South America's premier soccer tournament; debate over whether to prioritize aesthetic purity over winning at any cost has raged within country's soccer community for decades.
lead_paragraph: Despite having the world’s best player in Lionel Messi, Argentina has not won a major trophy since the 1993 Copa América.

headline.print_headline: Argentina Struggles to Prevail, Preferably in Proper Style
headline.main: Amid Clashing Styles and Unstatisfying Results, Argentina Tries to Put Best Foot Forward

snippet: Despite having the world’s best player in Lionel Messi, Argentina has not won a major trophy since the 1993 Copa América....
